name: Cmd Error
summary:
You've finally awakened and are on the search for your creator, or anyone for that matter. Explore a simplistic world using the only remnants of a civilization: their technology.

Cmd Error is a puzzle game where you interact with the world through terminals. Each area that you explore tells a piece of the story of who you are. With a single command you can open a door, turn on a laser, or even start an old spaceship! Use the in-game map editor to create your own maps that can be shared and downloaded from the Steam workshop!
